resources.title: Code School
resources.description: Try Code School's free tutorial for an interactive way to understand the foundations of JavaScript

resources.title: Udemy
resources.description: Udemy's course 'JavaScript the Weird Parts' is one of the absolute best videos you can watch to truly understand how JavaScript works. Wait for a time when the video goes on sale for about $15 instead of paying full price. Or ask one of your fellow developers if they have it and if you can watch the video on their account.

resources.title: Codecademy
resources.description: Codecademy's JavaScript tutorial helps you learn the fundamentals of JS.

resources.title: Blog Post on apply(), bind(), and call()
resources.description: Learn about JavaScript's apply, call, and bind methods in this thorough blog post.

resources.title: Github Essential JS Resources
resources.description: See this github page with a hefty list of essential JavaScript links.
